results.deck: Formally known as Condor, Inc., Blizzard North released two NFL Football games before being incorporated into Blizzard and turned into Blizzard North, releasing the legendary Diablo games
results.description: Condor Inc. was founded n 1996 by game veterans Max Schaefer, Erich Schaefer and David Brevik . With Diablo in development, Blizzard aquired and renamed the company and Diablo was released to an amazing success. Although two games were in development by 2003, a significant amount of employees took leave to form other companies such as Flagship Studios (now defunct as well after the flop Hellgate:London) Click Entertainment (Closed down after the lack of financial success of Throne of Darkness) and Castaway Entertainment.
results.name: Blizzard North
